source_endpoint.title: Source Endpoint ID
source_endpoint.description: Globus endpoint UUID where audio files are stored

dest_endpoint.title: Destination Endpoint ID
dest_endpoint.description: Globus endpoint UUID where files will be transferred

source_path.title: Source Path
source_path.description: Path on source endpoint containing audio files (should end with /)

dest_path.title: Destination Path
dest_path.description: Path on destination endpoint for transferred files (should end with /)

date_str.title: Date Filter
date_str.description: Date string (YYYY-MM-DD) to filter files by filename

transfer_label.title: Transfer Label
transfer_label.description: Optional label for the transfer task
